bibl.title: Hermopolite Localities and Splinter Nomes.
bibl.note: 1. P. Bal. [P. Bala'izah] II, 355: A fiscal register from the Theodosiopolite. VIIIth century. - 2. M.P.E.R., N.S. XVII, 4a (= S.B. XXII, 15563): A writing exercise, or an 'alphabetic' list of villages. VIIIth century. - 3. P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 30883 (= S.B. XXII, 15260) and a familiar company. VIIth century. 4. P. Duke Inv. 93. Six topoi and a village paying wheat. Koussite nome, 7th century.

GONIS Nikolaos, Hermopolite Localities and Splinter Nomes.

1. P. Bal. [P. Bala'izah] II, 355: A fiscal register from the Theodosiopolite. VIIIth century. - 2. M.P.E.R., N.S. XVII, 4a (= S.B. XXII, 15563): A writing exercise, or an 'alphabetic' list of villages. VIIIth century. - 3. P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 30883 (= S.B. XXII, 15260) and a familiar company. VIIth century. 4. P. Duke Inv. 93. Six topoi and a village paying wheat. Koussite nome, 7th century.
